text: Triple Cross is a 1966 British French German World War II action movie directed by Terence Young and was based on the 1953 novel by Eddie Chapman. It stars Christopher Plummer, Romy Schneider, Trevor Howard, Yul Brynner, Claudine Auger, Harry Meyen, Gert Fr√∂be and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1966 war movies Category:1966 action movies Category:British action movies Category:British war movies Category:French action movies Category:German action movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Terence Young
title: Triple Cross (1966 movie)
